title: Ticket #1498: Remove Birdbath web page; web services (SOAP) in manual
description: Must decide if we should update the Birdbath web page to point into a manual, or simply remove the web page and any other references to Birdbath.
remarks: The wiki will now be the main repository of all this info. The one remaining link on the Birdbath web page that was NOT in the wiki (link to 2006 powerpoint presentation) now IS in the wiki, and the Condor home page link to Birdbath is gone.
creator: smoler
